summary: liverpool manager brendan rodgers has reminded raheem sterling and jordon ibe about their professional responsibilities . sterling , the england international who will lead liverpool 's line at wembley on sunday in the absence of the injured daniel sturridge , was exposed for inhaling the legal high nitrous oxide on monday . ibe was present among the reds squad during their training session on friday ahead of their fa cup semi .
